Another thing, you need to run it from the internal hdd.

I still want o play this game.. no fix yet guys?

To get this game to work (even I had problems with the audio) you have to have a newer version of Multiman and when you have the game highlighted, press select and x together at the same time. This SURPRISINGLY does fix the sound in the game.

Alright fellas... this release does work. Use the latest multiman.. and I mean the LATEST version. And press SELECT+X every time to start the game and the everything will work fine. It will fix the sound issues and game crashes. 

Hope this works for you guys... it worked for me :)

And thanks for the upload consolasatope!
You don't have to press select+x every time, just the first time you try to run the game. It will be fixed after you do it one time.
can someone plz tell at wat part xactly should we press select and x to make the audio come plz plz i have been waiting for this game !!!!
explain what to do to make sound work anyone plz

guys it works i confirm it. and there is no freezing after a match.
i got it working today only.
the way to make it work is update to the latest multiman an also you have to copy it in an external drive. go into multiman go into game settings(press Triangle, choose game settings) and then select the bd mirror option under the game cover. go back(press O) start the game by pressing X. and also update the game to latest version from brewlogy as spook said.
and yes sound does not work from internal HDD only Externa drives
